profile:
ROYAL GREEN IRRIGATION was established in 2003 in Toronto Ontario and currently serves customers throughout the GTA. We started in business specializing in irrigation and service to residential and commercial sprinkles systems. As the leaders in our industry sector, we take great pride in offering the highest level of service to all of our customers. Our strong commitment to quality products and excellence in service has lead to many satisfied and loyal customers returning year after year.
 
ROYAL GREEN IRRIGATION services all Brands of irrigation systems and estimates are free. We understand that a major component to maintaining a healthy lush landscape is the necessity for proper watering. Applying the right amount of water in the right places at the right time is vital to your landscapes existence. A fully automatic irrigation system accomplishes all of these tasks while you are sleeping or enjoying time away at the cottage. Water is a precious commodity and the benefits of irrigation are in its conservation. Call ROYAL GREEN IRRIGATION today, your gardens and lawn will never look better.

profile:
The Sprinkler Company Inc. specializes in the design, installation and maintenance of automatic lawn and garden watering systems, garden lighting systems for private and commercial property and full services on Landscaping Design. Sprinkler company also offers servicing of all types of existing irrigation systems, including system opening, closure, and repairs. 
***
We provide 5 YEARS WARRANTY FOR ALL OUR INSTALLATIONS.
***
More information on www.SprinklerCompany.ca
***
Please call us for FREE ESTIMATION.
***
Due to the situation with Covid-19, our company has become available online consultation, in some cases it is possible to conduct an online assessment of the planned installation.
The company continue to work officially. If you need help with seasonal Start-Up/Testing of the sprinkler system or any emergency service, we are ready to help you! All our technicians respect the social distance and have all the necessary equipment in the current situation regarding to COVID-19!

profile:
Pro Green Irrigation is a lawn sprinkler professional, offering a wide variety of services, which includes new installations, service to existing systems, and annual maintenance programs. Pro Green manufactures a time-controlled underground sprinkler system which eliminates the routine and monotonous job of hand watering and also savers water.  

***

The Automatic Sprinkler Systems from Pro Green Irrigation and gives your valuable landscape the uniform coverage it needs to stay healthy and vigorous.
Pro Green Irrigation is a family business with all of the advantages of a large company. While our focus is on residential customers, Pro Green also installs and services commercial systems in strip malls, warehouses, subway stations, hospitals, golf course club houses and office buildings. Whether you're a homeowner, developer, management company or general contractor, our goal is to give you the caring attention of a small family-run business, while maintaining a professional approach to our nearly 1500 customers.

***

One of the main advantages of working with Pro Green Irrigation is our experienced staff, including two full-time installation crews and three professional servicemen. We also have a full office staff, year round employees, and seven fully equipped vehicles. You can trust that Pro Green Irrigation will be around, year in and year out, to service your system and honor our comprehensive 5-Year Warranty *. For all these reasons and many more, Pro Green Irrigation is your lawn sprinkler professional. Pro Green Irrigation is a member of Landscape Ontario and the Canadian Nursery Landscape Association. We continually upgrade our skills with training that keeps us on the cutting edge of irrigation technology. If you would like to see a Pro Green Irrigation system in your area, we'll be happy to give you a list of referrals.

***

*Ask about our 5-year warranty
